price: Wͻnya nwunu wͻ hͻ, na wͻnya anom deε biara nso nka nhwε,
arabic: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرۡدٗا وَلَا شَرَابًا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: lā yadhūqūna fīhā bardan walā sharāban
